MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA23 area of West Kilbride. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:05am. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete the repairs to our overhead electricity network in the Bushglen area, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:45am on Sunday, 01 November 2020
